# AVExperienceController.ExpandedConfiguration.AutomaticTransitionToImmersive

**Enumeration**

The expanded experience automatic transition behavior into the immersive experience.

## Declaration

```swift
enum AutomaticTransitionToImmersive
```

## Overview

Use this enum to describe the desired automatic transition behavior into the immersive experience. The behaviors defined here are subject to system settings.

## Enumeration Cases

- **AVExperienceController.ExpandedConfiguration.AutomaticTransitionToImmersive.default**: Describes the system default behavior.
- **AVExperienceController.ExpandedConfiguration.AutomaticTransitionToImmersive.none**: Describes no behavior.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
